Everton picks up a hard fought [point](https://www.liverpoolecho.co.uk/sport/football/football-news/everton-aston-villa-score-highlights-28443636) over Villa, providing a little separation from the relegation zone. I remain optimistic the new stadium will debut as an EPL venue. UTFT.

Good news out of the Florida legislature's first week in session, some bipartisan sanity on the outrageous "slavery benefited the slaves" history curriculum: [Florida Phoenix](https://floridaphoenix.com/2024/01/11/dems-gop-push-to-remove-language-about-slaves-skills-and-personal-benefit-in-fl-state-standards/)

The [Bonnaroo](https://www.bonnaroo.com) lineup is out, I am pleased especially with Sunday's Four Tet and fred again.. inclusion.

Mike Norvell will [remain](https://www.tallahassee.com/story/sports/college/fsu/football/2024/01/12/mike-norvell-stays-fsu-football-coach-wont-replace-nick-saban-alabama/72142161007/) as head coach for FSU, what a wonderful bit of news to emerge amongst the Alabama search for a Saban successor.
